## Review Checklist

**The following must be completed before merging:**

### Author Self-Review
- [ ] I have reviewed my own code
- [ ] Code compiles without errors (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] No debug code, `console.log`, or temporary comments left in
- [ ] TypeScript types are properly defined (no unnecessary `any`)
- [ ] Error handling is implemented where needed
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, credentials) is included

### Testing
- [ ] Changes have been tested locally
- [ ] UI changes are responsive across screen sizes
- [ ] Edge cases have been considered

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project conventions (see [AGENTS.md](../AGENTS.md))
- [ ] Components are small and focused
- [ ] Naming follows project standards (PascalCase components, kebab-case files)
- [ ] New dependencies are justified and documented
